DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate six-minute-walking-distance COPD-patients breathe oxygen comparison breathe normal air . Patients , increase walking-distance 15 % 35m breathing oxygen , so-called `` Oxygen Responders . '' The study aim find attribute Oxygen Responder investigate , patient change `` respond '' high performance endurance .
DOC.criteria: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease III/IV Severe exacerbation last 4 week prior begin study ( definition exacerbation : symptom 3 day relevant change drug therapy ( cortisone , antibiotic ) ) Severe exacerbation rehabilitation Cardiac insufficiency
